縳字的基本解释

縳
zhuàn
卷，裹束：“闾丘婴以帷縳其妻而载之。”
成束的鸟羽的计量单位：“十羽谓之縳。”

縳
juàn
　ㄐㄩㄢˋ
白色细绢。
古同“卷”。

縳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juàn］
［《集韻》古倦切，去綫，見。］
(1)白色细绢。
(2)用同“卷”。
[②]［zhuàn］
［《集韻》柱戀切，去綫，澄。］
(1)羽数名。
(2)卷；束。

縳字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　縳； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页936第02
【廣韻】持兗切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】柱兗切，?音篆。【說文】白鮮色也。　又【集韻】規掾切，音絹。【儀禮·聘禮註】紡，紡絲爲之，今之縳也。【釋文】縳，聲類以爲今正絹字。　又【廣韻】直戀切【集韻】柱戀切，?音瑑。【博雅】束也。【周禮·地官·羽人】十羽爲審，百羽爲搏，十搏爲縳。【註】縳，羽數束名也。　又【集韻】樞絹切，音釧。雙縳，緻繒也。　又【集韻】重緣切，音椽。卷也。

縳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
縳字的起名意思

暂无。

Bind
Basic explanation of words
Bind
zhuàn
Rolled, bound: "Lu Qiuying used a curtain to bind his wife and carried it."
The unit of measurement for bunches of toba: "Ten feathers are called bound."
Bind
juàn
ㄐ ㄩ ㄢ
White fine silk.
Gu Tong "roll".
Bind
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juàn］
["Jiyun" ancient tired cut, go to the line, see. ]
(1) White fine silk.
(2) Use the same "volume".
[②]［zhuàn］
["Ji Yun" Zhulian cuts, goes to the line, and clears. ]
(1) The number of feathers.
(2) Volume; bundle.
Bind
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　Binding; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: Page 936 02
[Guang Yun] holding Yan cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Zhu Yan cut,? Sound seal. [Said the text] White and fresh color.　 [Ji Yun] The rules are cut, and the sound is silk. 【Ritual and Betrothal Note】Spinning, spinning for it, now it is bound. 【Explanation】Bound, the sound type is considered to be Jinzheng silk characters.　[Guangyun] Direct love cut [Jiyun] Zhulian cut,? Yin Yu. [Bo Ya] Shu Ye. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Yuren】Ten Yu is the trial, one hundred is the fight, and ten strokes are the tie. [Note] Tie, the number of feathers is also named.　 [Ji Yun] Shu silk cut, sound Chuan. Double bondage, cause suffocation.　 [Ji Yun] heavy edge cut, sound rafter. Volume also.
